titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: MLH1 IMMUNOHISTOCHEMISTRY NUCLEAR EXPRESSION INTACT INDICATION CODE - Permitted Codes

strow.stentry: Yes - the immunohistochemistry nuclear expression is intact
No - the immunohistochemistry nuclear expression is not intact
